= `static` Class *jplex.common.Locale*  =

== Description ==
Global class that manipulates the global language and local settings. We define components on it corresponding to
some parts of the locales. The defined components are for now: 'Date', ...



== Methods ==                                
|| *Signature* || *Return Type* || *Description* ||
|| `current(component, field)` || `String|Array` || Useful default usage of the locale string, corresponds to: <br/><pre>Locale.get(component).get(field)</pre><br/>with undefined error treatment of course<br />  - `component <String>` The locale component - `field <String>` The wanted field||
|| `get(component, lang)` || `Hash` || Get the complete HashSet corresponding to the following component and lang<br />  - `component <String>` The component - `lang <String>` The lang, Locale.lang if not defined||
|| `init(component, hashSet)` || `void` || Initialize a component into the Locale storage<br />  - `component <String>` The component - `hashSet <String>` Its definition, first indexed by the ISO code of the language, then by the fields||
